content: make this beginner friendly crochet cross body bag that are made from classic granny squares this is a great fun crochet granny square project and it is perfect for beginners what you will receive ✔ instant download pdf file for - classic granny square cross body bag - no patterns are shipped about this bag ✔ worked flat & in the round ✔ skill level beginner friendly ✔ type of instructions easy to follow written instructions and pictures included - does not include any charts ✔ language standard american terms written in english only materials ✔ all crochet hook and yarn information inside the pattern sizing ✔ one size only refund policy ✔ all digital sales are final about ✔ truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet shawl patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free pdf version of my free pattern disclaimer ✔ © trulycrochet do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern with pattern credit
